text: We made it. I guess I was wrong, there was no danger at all.
where: EXT. CORUSCANT, LANDING PLATFORM - DAY

text: Cordé...
where: EXT. CORUSCANT, LANDING PLATFORM - DAY

text: ... I'm sorry, m'lady... I'm... not sure I...
where: EXT. CORUSCANT, LANDING PLATFORM - DAY
EXT. CORUSCANT, LANDING PLATFORM - DAY

text: I should not have come back.
where: EXT. CORUSCANT, LANDING PLATFORM - DAY

text: M'Lady, you are still in danger.
where: EXT. CORUSCANT, LANDING PLATFORM - DAY

text: This vote is very important. You didyour duty and Cordé did hers. Now come. (she doesn't respond) M'Lady, please!
where: EXT. CORUSCANT, LANDING PLATFORM - DAY

text: Order! We shall have order! The motion for the Republic to commission an army takes precedent, and that is what we will vote on at this time.
where: INT. SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: ...My esteemed colleagues, excuse me... I have just received some tragic and disturbing news. Senator Amidala of the Naboo system... Has been assassinated!
where: INT. SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: (continued) This grievous blow is especially personal to me. Before I became Chancellor, I served Amidala when she was Queen. She was a great leader who fought for justice, not only in this honourable assembly, but also on her home planet. She was so loved she could have been elected queen for life. She believed in public service, and she fervently believed in democracy. Her death is a great loss to us all. We will all mourn her as a relentless champion of freedom... and as a dear friend.
where: INT. SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: How many more Senators will die before this civil strife ends! We must confront these rebels now, and they need an army to do it.
where: INT. SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: Why weren't the Jedi able to stop this assassination? We are no longer safe, under their protection.
where: INT. SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: The Republic needs more security now! Before it comes to war.
where: INT. SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: Must I remind the Senator from Malastare that negotiations are continuing with the separatists. Peace is our objective here... not war.
where: INT. SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: My noble colleagues, I concur with the Supreme Chancellor. At all costs, we do not want war!
where: INT. SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: It is with great surprise and joy the chair recognises the Senator from Naboo, PADME Amidala.
where: INT. SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: Less than an hour ago, an assassination attempt was made against my life. One of my bodyguards and six others were ruthlessly and senselessly murdered. I was the target but, more importantly, I believe this security measure before you, was the target. I have led the opposition to build an army... but there is someone in this body who will stop at nothing to assure it's passage...
where: INT. SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: (continuing) I warn you, if you vote to create this army, war will follow. I have experienced the misery of war first-hand; I do not wish to do it again.
where: INT. SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: Wake up, Senators... you must wake up! If you offer the separatists violence, they can only show us violence in return! Many will lose their lives. All will lose their freedom. This decision could very well destroy the very foundation of our great Republic. I pray you do not let fear push you into a disastrous decision. Vote down this security measure, which is nothing less than a declaration of war! Does anyone here want that? I cannot believe they do.
where: INT. SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: My motion to defer the vote must be dealt with first. That is the rule of law.
where: INT. SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: Due to the lateness of the hour and the seriousness of this motion, we will take up these matters tomorrow. Until then, the Senate stands adjourned.
where: INT. SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: I don't know how much longer I can hold off the vote, my friends. More and more star systems are joining the separatists.
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: If they do break away -
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: No! I will not let that happen!
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: But if they do, you must realise there aren't enough Jedi to protect the Republic. We are keepers of the peace, not soldiers.
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: Master Yoda, do you think it will really come to war?
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: Worse than war, I fear... Much worse.
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: What?
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: What do you sense, Master?
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: Impossible to see ... The Dark Side clouds everything. But this I am sure of - (opens his eyes) Do their duty the Jedi will.
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: The loyalist committee has arrived, my Lord.
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: Send them in.
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: With you the force is strong... young Senator. To see you alive brings warm feeling to my heart.
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: Thank you, Master Yoda. Do you have any idea who was behind the attack?
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: Our intelligence points to disgruntled spice miners, on the moons of Naboo.
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: I don't wish to disagree but I think that Count Dooku was behind it.
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: You know, M'Lady, COUNT DOOKU was once a Jedi. He wouldn't assassinate anyone, it is not in his character.
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: He is a political idealist, not a murderer.
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: In dark times nothing is what it appears to be, but the fact remains Senator, in grave danger you are.
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: Count Dooku has always avoided any kind of conflict. It appears he has no desire to start a war. Why would he kill you? To what end?
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: I don't know, but everything in my being tells me he was behind it...
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: Master Jedi, may I suggest that the Senator be placed under the protection of your graces.
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: Do you think that is a wise use of manpower during these stressful times?
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: Chancellor, if I may comment, I do not believe the...
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: ..."situation is that serious." No, but I do, Senator.
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: Chancellor, please! I don't want any more guards!
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: I realise all too well that additional security might be disruptive for you, but perhaps someone you are familiar with... an old friend like... Master Kenobi...
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: That's possible. He has just returned from a Border dispute on Ansion.
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: You must remember him, M'Lady... he watched over you during the blockade conflict.
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: This is not necessary, Chancellor.
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: Do it for me, M'Lady, please. I will rest easier. We had a big scare today. The thought of losing you is unbearable.
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: I will have Obi-Wan report to you immediately, M'Lady.
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: Too little about yourself you worry, Senator, and too much about politics. Be mindful of your danger, PADME. Accept our help.
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: I will not like this Republiv, that has stood for over a thousand years, be split in two
where: INT. CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE - DAY

text: Obi! Obi! Obi! Mesa sooo smilen to see'en yousa. Wahoooooo!
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT CORRIDOR - EVENING

text: It's Good to see you, too, Jar Jar.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT CORRIDOR - EVENING

text: Oops! Wheresa mesa manners? Excuse me, Master Obi-Wan. I completely forgot myself for a moment there. I have had to learn Diplodiaclect... speak it like a native now. Don't really see the point, actually, but members of the Senate seem to prefer it...
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT CORRIDOR - EVENING

text: (continuing) ...and this, I take it, is your apprentice... Nooooooooo! Annie? Noooooooo! Little Bitty Annie? (Looks at Anakin) Nooooooo! Yousa so biggen! Yiyiyiyyi! Annie!! Mesa no believen.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT CORRIDOR - EVENING

text: Hi, Jar Jar.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT CORRIDOR - EVENING

text: Annie! Annie! Yiyiyiyiyiyiiii!
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT CORRIDOR - EVENING

text: Lookie... lookie... Oops!... Oh, dear, I'm afraid I've forgotten myself again.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: It's a great pleasure to see you again, M'Lady.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: It has been far too long Master Kenobi. I'm so glad our paths have crossed again... but I must warn you that I think your presence here is unnecessary.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: I'm sure the Jedi Council have their reasons.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: Annie?? (stares) My goodness you've grown.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: (trying to be smooth) So have you... grown more beautiful, I mean... and much shorter... for a Senator, I mean.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: Oh Annie, you'll always be that little boy I knew on Tatooine.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: Our presence will be invisible, M'Lady.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: I am very grateful you are here, Master Kenobi. The situation is more dangerous than the Senator will admit.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: I don't need more security, I need answers. I want to know who is trying to kill me.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: (frowning) We're here to protect you Senator, not to start an investigation.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: We will find out who is trying to kill you PADME, I promise you.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: We are not going to exceed our mandate, my young Padawan learner.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: I meant in the interest of protecting her, Master, of course.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: We are not going through this exercise again, Anakin. You will pay attention to my lead.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: Why?
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: What??!!
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: Why else do you think we were assigned to her, if not to find the killer? Protection is a job for local security... not Jedi. It's overkill, Master. Investigation is implied in our mandate.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: We will do as the Council has instructed, and you will learn your place, young one.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: Perhaps with merely your presence, the mysteries surrounding this threat will be revealed. Now if you will excuse me I will retire.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: Well, I know I feel a lot better having you here. I'll have an officer on every floor and I'll be at the command centre downstairs.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: Mesa busten wit happiness seein Yousa again, Annie. Deesa bad times, bombad times.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: She didn't even recognize me, Jar Jar. I thought about her every day since we parted... and she's forgotten me completely.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: Shesa happy. Happier den mesa see-en her in longo time.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: Anakin, you're focusing on the Negative again. Be mindful of your thoughts. She was glad to see us. Now lets check the security here.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: Yes, my master.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, APARTMENT - EVENING

text: Why couldn't we see this attack on the Senator?
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, CORRIDOR - EVENING

text: Masking the future, is this disturbance in the Force.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, CORRIDOR - EVENING

text: The propecy is coming true, the Dark Side is growing.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, CORRIDOR - EVENING

text: And only those who have turned to the Dark Side can sense the possibilities of the future. Only going through the Dark Side can we see.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, CORRIDOR - EVENING

text: It's been ten years, and the Sith still have no shown themselves. Do you think they are behind this?
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, CORRIDOR - EVENING

text: ...Out there, they are. A certainty that is.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, CORRIDOR - EVENING

text: Do you think Obi-Wan's apprentice will be able to bring balance to the Force?
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, CORRIDOR - EVENING

text: Only if he chooses to follow his destiny.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, CORRIDOR - EVENING

text: Captain Typho has more than enough men downstairs. No assassin will try that way. Any activity up here?
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN R0OM - NIGHT

text: Quiet as a tomb. I don't like just waiting here for something to happen to her.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN R0OM - NIGHT

text: What's going on?
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN R0OM - NIGHT

text: She covered that camera. I don't think she liked me watching her.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN R0OM - NIGHT

text: What is she thinking?
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN R0OM - NIGHT

text: She programmed ARTOO to warn us if there's an intruder.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN R0OM - NIGHT

text: It's not an intruder I'm worried about. There are many other ways to kill a Senator.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN R0OM - NIGHT

text: I know, but we also want to catch this assassin. Don't we, Master?
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN R0OM - NIGHT

text: You're using her as bait??
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN R0OM - NIGHT

text: It was her idea... No harm will come to her. I can sense everything going on in that room. Trust me.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN R0OM - NIGHT

text: It's too risky... and your senses aren't that attuned, young apprentice.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN R0OM - NIGHT

text: And yours are?
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN R0OM - NIGHT

text: Possibly.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN R0OM - NIGHT

text: You look tired.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

text: I don't sleep well, anymore.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

text: Because of your mother?
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

text: I don't know why I keep dreaming About her now. I haven't seen her since I was little.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

text: Dreams pass in time.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

text: I'd rather dream of PADME. Just Being around her again is... intoxicating.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

text: Mind your thoughts, Anakin, they betray you. You've made a commitment to the Jedi order... a commitment not easily broken... and don't forget she's a politician. They're not to be trusted.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

text: She's not like the others in the Senate, Master.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

text: It's been my experience that Senators are only focused on pleasing those who fund their campaigns... and they are more than willing to forget the niceties of democracy to get those funds.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

text: Not another lecture, Master. Not on the economics of politics.... It's too early in the morning... and besides, you're generalising. The Chancellor doesn't appear to be corrupt.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

text: Palpatine's a politician, I've observed that he is very clever at following the passions and prejudices of the Senators.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

text: I think he is a good man. My instincts are very positive about...
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

text: I sense it, too.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT, MAIN ROOM - NIGHT

text: Stay here!
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - NIGHT

text: I have a bad feeling about this.
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: That was wacky! I almost lost you in the traffic.
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: What took you so long?
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: Oh, you know, Master, I couldn't find a speeder I really liked, with an open cockpit... and with the right speed capabilities... and then you know I had to get a really gonzo color...
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: If you'd spend as much time working on your saber skills as you do on your wit, young Padawan, you would rival Master Yoda as a swordsman.
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: I thought I already did.
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: Only in your mind, my very young apprentice. Careful!! Hey, easy!!
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: Sorry, I forgot you don't like flying, Master.
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: I don't mind flying... but what you're doing is suicide!
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: Master, you know I've been flying since before I could walk. I'm very good at this.
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: Just slow down!
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: (continuing) Wait! Don't go in there!
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: (continuing) You know I don't like it when you do that!
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: Sorry, Master. Don't worry, this guy's gonna kill himself any minute now!
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: What are you doing? He's gonna blast me!
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: Right - this isn't working.
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: That was too close!
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: Clear that!
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: What??
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: Clear the flag! We're losing power! Hurry!
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: Whooooaaa! Don't do that! I don't like it when you do that!
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: So sorry, Master.
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: It's dangerous near those power couplings! Slow down! Don't go through there!
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: (continuing) Yiiii, what are you doing?
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: Sorry, Master!
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: (sarcastically) Oh, that was good...
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: That was crazy!!!
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: (continuing) Ahh, damn.
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: Stop!!
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: No, we can make it.
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: I'm crazy... I'm crazy... I'm crazy.
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: But it worked... we made it.
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: (angrily) It didn't work... we've stalled! And you almost got us killed!
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: I think we're still alive.
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: (very angrily) It was stupid!
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: (sheepishly) I could have made it...
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: (furious) But you didn't!!! And now we've lost him.
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: No we didn’t...
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: Where are you going?! He went down there, the other way.
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: This is a shortcut... I think.
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: What do you mean, ‘You think?’ What kind of shortcut?! He went completely the other way! You’ve lost him!
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: Master, if we keep this chase going, that creep’s gonna end up deep fried. Personally, I’d very much like to find out who in the hell he is and who he’s working for...
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: (sarcastic) Oh, so that’s why we’re going in the wrong direction.
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: (continuing) Well, you lost him.
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: I’m deeply sorry, Master.
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: (continuing) Excuse me for a moment.
where: EXT. CITYSCAPE, CORUSCANT - NIGHT

text: Anakin!
where: EXT. ENTERTAINMENT STREET - NIGHT

text: She went into that club, Master.
where: EXT. ENTERTAINMENT STREET - NIGHT

text: Patience.
where: EXT. ENTERTAINMENT STREET - NIGHT

text: (continuing) Here. Next time try not to lose it.
where: EXT. ENTERTAINMENT STREET - NIGHT

text: Sorry, Master.
where: EXT. ENTERTAINMENT STREET - NIGHT

text: A Jedi's saber is his most precious possession.
where: EXT. ENTERTAINMENT STREET - NIGHT

text: Yes, Master.
where: EXT. ENTERTAINMENT STREET - NIGHT

text: He must keep it with him at all times.
where: EXT. ENTERTAINMENT STREET - NIGHT

text: I know, Master.
where: EXT. ENTERTAINMENT STREET - NIGHT

text: This weapon is your life!
where: EXT. ENTERTAINMENT STREET - NIGHT

text: I've heard this lesson before..
where: EXT. ENTERTAINMENT STREET - NIGHT

text: But, you haven't learned anything, Anakin.
where: EXT. ENTERTAINMENT STREET - NIGHT

text: I try, Master.
where: EXT. ENTERTAINMENT STREET - NIGHT

text: Why do I think you are going to be the death of me?!
where: INT. NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

text: Don't say that Master... You're the closest thing I have to a father... I love you. I don't want to cause you pain.
where: INT. NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

text: Then why don't you listen to me?!
where: INT. NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

text: I will. I'll do better, I promise.
where: INT. NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

text: Do you see him him?
where: INT. NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

text: I think he's a she...

text: Then be extra careful... (nods to a room) Check it out.
where: INT. NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

text: Where are you going, Master?
where: INT. NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

where: INT. NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

text: Wanna buy some death sticks?
where: INT. NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

text: You don't want to sell me death- sticks.
where: INT. NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

text: I don't want to sell you death- sticks.
where: INT. NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

text: You want to go home and rethink your life.
where: INT. NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

text: I want to go home and rethink my life.
where: INT. NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

text: Easy... Official business. Go back to your drinks
where: INT. NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

text: Do you know who it was you were trying to kill?
where: EXT. ALLEY OUTSIDE NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

text: The Senator from Naboo.
where: EXT. ALLEY OUTSIDE NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

text: Who hired you?
where: EXT. ALLEY OUTSIDE NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

text: It was just a job.
where: EXT. ALLEY OUTSIDE NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

text: Tell us!
where: EXT. ALLEY OUTSIDE NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

text: That Senator's gonna die soon anyway, and the next one won't make the same mistake I did...
where: EXT. ALLEY OUTSIDE NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

text: This wound's going to need treatment.
where: EXT. ALLEY OUTSIDE NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

text: Who hired you? Tell us... tell us now!

where: EXT. ALLEY OUTSIDE NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT

text: Representative Binks. I know I can count on you.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: Yousa betchen mesa bottums.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: What?!
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: (coughs, recovers) Oh, pardone-ay, Senator. I mean, I am honoured to accept this heavy burden. I take on this responsibility with deep humility tinged with an overwhelming pride. (pompously) It is not every day that I am called upon to...
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: You're a good friend, Jar Jar. I don't wish to hold you up. I'm sure you have a great deal to do.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: Of course, M'lady.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: I do not like this idea of hiding.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: Don't worry. Now that the Council has ordered an investigation, it won't take Master Obi-Wan long to find that bounty hunter.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: (frustrated) I haven't worked for a year to defeat the "Military Creation Act" not to be here when its fate is decided.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: Sometimes we have to let go of our pride and do what is requested of us.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: Pride?!? Annie, you're young, and you don't have a very firm grip on politics. I suggest you reserve your opinions for some other time.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: Sorry, M'lady. I was only trying to...
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: Annie! No!
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: Please don't call me that.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: What?
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: Annie...
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: I've always called you that... i is your name, isn't it?
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: It's Anakin. When you say Annie it's like I'm still a little boy... and I'm not.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: I'm sorry, Anakin. It's impossible to deny you've... (looks him over) ...that you've grown up.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: Master Obi-Wan manages not to see it...
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: Mentors have a way of seeing more of our faults than we would like. It's the only way we grow.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: Don't get me wrong... Obi-Wan is a great mentor. As wise as Master Yoda and as powerful as Master Windu. I am truly thankful to be his apprentice. Only... although I'm a Padawan learner, in some ways... a lot of ways... I'm ahead of him. I'm ready for the trials. I know I am! He knows it too. He believes I'm too unpredictable... Other Jedi my age have gone through the trials and made it... I know I started my training late... but he won't let me move on.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: That must be frustrating.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: It's worse... he's overly critical. He never listens! He just doesn't understand! It's not fair!
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: I'm sorry... You sounded exactly like that little boy I once knew, when he didn't get his way.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: I'm not whining! I'm not.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: I didn't say it to hurt you.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: I know...
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: Anakin...
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: (continuing) Don't try to grow up too fast.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: I am grown up. You said it yourself
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: Please don't look at me like that.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: Why not?
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: Because I can see what you're thinking.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: (laughing) Ahh... so, you have Jedi powers too?
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: It makes me feel uncomfortable.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: Sorry, M'lady.
where: INT. SENATE BUILDING, AMIDALA'S APARTMENT - DAY

text: Be safe, m'lady.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SPACEPORT FREIGHTER DOCKS, TRANSPORT BUS - DAY

text: Thank you, Captain. Take good care of Dorme... the threat's on you two now.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SPACEPORT FREIGHTER DOCKS, TRANSPORT BUS - DAY

text: He'll be safe with me.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SPACEPORT FREIGHTER DOCKS, TRANSPORT BUS - DAY

text: You'll be fine.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SPACEPORT FREIGHTER DOCKS, TRANSPORT BUS - DAY

text: It's not me, M'Lady. I worry about you. What if they realise I'm not you?
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SPACEPORT FREIGHTER DOCKS, TRANSPORT BUS - DAY

text: (looks to Anakin) Then my Jedi protector will have to prove how grown up he is.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SPACEPORT FREIGHTER DOCKS, TRANSPORT BUS - DAY

text: Anakin, you stay put on Naboo. Do not attract any attention. Do absolutely nothing without checking in with me or the Council.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SPACEPORT FREIGHTER DOCKS, TRANSPORT BUS - DAY

text: Yes, Master.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SPACEPORT FREIGHTER DOCKS, TRANSPORT BUS - DAY

text: (to Padme) I will get to the bottom of this plot quickly, M'Lady. You'll be back here in no time.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SPACEPORT FREIGHTER DOCKS, TRANSPORT BUS - DAY

text: I will be most grateful for your speed, Master Jedi.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SPACEPORT FREIGHTER DOCKS, TRANSPORT BUS - DAY

text: Time to go.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SPACEPORT FREIGHTER DOCKS, TRANSPORT BUS - DAY

text: I know.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SPACEPORT FREIGHTER DOCKS, TRANSPORT BUS - DAY

text: May the Force be with you.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SPACEPORT FREIGHTER DOCKS, TRANSPORT BUS - DAY

text: May the Force be with you, Master.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SPACEPORT FREIGHTER DOCKS, TRANSPORT BUS - DAY

text: Suddenly, I'm afraid...
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SPACEPORT FREIGHTER DOCKS, TRANSPORT BUS - DAY

text: I'm kinda scared too. This is my first assignment on my own.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SPACEPORT FREIGHTER DOCKS, TRANSPORT BUS - DAY

text: There's nothing to worry about... we have ARTOO with us.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SPACEPORT FREIGHTER DOCKS, TRANSPORT BUS - DAY

text: I hope he doesn't try anything foolish.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SPACEPORT FREIGHTER DOCKS, TRANSPORT BUS - DAY

text: I'd be more concerned about her doing something, than him.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SPACEPORT FREIGHTER DOCKS, TRANSPORT BUS - DAY

text: Place the subject for analysis on the sensot tray, please.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: It's a toxic dart. I need to know where it came from and who made it.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: One moment, please.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: (continuing) As you can see on your screen, subject weapon does not exist in any known culture. Markings cannot be identified. Probablt self-made by a warrior not associated with any known society.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: Excuse me? Could you try again please?
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: Master Jedi, our records are very thorough. they cover eight percent of the galaxy. If I can't tell you where it came from, nobody can.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: Thanks for your assistance! You may not be able to figure this out, but I think I know someone who might.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: Keep moving! Keep moving!
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: (continuing) Hey! No Droids!
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: No, no, Mom, no...
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: (continuing) What?
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: You seemed to be having a nightmare.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: (continuing) Are you hungry?
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: Thank you.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: We went into lightspeed a while ago.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: I look forward to seeing Nabooagain. I've thought about it every day since I left. It's by far the most beautiful place I've ever seen...
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: You were just a little boy then. It may not be as you remember it; time changes your perception.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: I think time has given me much more mature feelings to enhance my perception.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: It must be difficult having sworn your life to the Jedi... not being able to visit the places you like... or do the things you like...
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: Or be with the people I love.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: Are you allowed to love? I thought that was forbidden for a Jedi.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: Attachment is forbidden. Possession is forbidden. Compassion, which I would define as unconditional love, is central to a Jedi's life, so you might say we're encouraged to love.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: You have changed so much
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: You haven't changed a bit. You're exactly the way I remember you in my dreams. I doubt if Naboo has changed much either.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: It hasn't...
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: I can't wait to breathe the sweet breeze that comes off the rolling hills. Whenever I try to visualise the Force, those hills are what I see.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: (continuing) I love Naboo.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: (changing the subject) Were you dreaming about you mother earlier, weren't you?
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: Yes... I left Tatooine so long ago, my memory of her is fading. I don't want to lose it. Recently I've been seeing her in my dreams... vivid dreams... scary dreams. I worry about her.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ANALYSIS CUBICLES - LATE DAY

text: Can I help ya?
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: I'm looking for Dexter.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: Waddya want him for?
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: He's not in trouble. It's personal.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: Someone to see ya, honey (lowering her voice) A Jedi by the looks of him.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: Obi-Wan!
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: Hey, Dex.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: Take a seat! Be right with ya!
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: You want a cup of ardees?
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: Thank you.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: Hey, ol' buddy!
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: Hey, Dex.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: So, my friend. What can I do for ya?
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: You can tell me what this is.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: Well, whattaya know...
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: I ain't seen one of these since I was prospecting on Subterrel beyond the Outer Rim!
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: Do you know where it came from ?
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: This baby belongs to them cloners. What you got here is a Kamino Kyberdart.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: Kamino Kyberdart... I wonder why it didn't show up in any analysis archive.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: It's these funny little cuts on the side give it away... Those analysis droids you've got over there only focus on symbols, you know. I should think you Jedi would have more respect for the difference between knowledge and wisdom.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: Well, Dex, if droids could think, we wouldn't be here, would we? (laughing) Kamino... doesn't sound familiar. Is it part of the Republic?
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: No, it's beyond the Outer Rim. I'd say about twelve parsecs outside the Rishi Maze, toward the south. It should be easy to find, even for those droids in your archive to find. Those Kaminoans keep to themselves. They're cloners. Damned good ones, too.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: Cloners? Are they friendly?
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: It depends.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: On what, Dex?
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: On how good your manners are... and how big your pocketbook is...
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: If I grew up here, I don't think I'd ever leave.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: (laughing) I doubt that.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: No, really. When I started my training, I was very homesick and very lonely. This city and my Mom were the only pleasant things I had to think about... The problem was, the more I thought about my Mom, the worse I felt. But I would feel better if I thought about the palace - the way it shimmers in the sunlight - the way the air always smells of flowers...
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: ...and the soft sound of the distant waterfalls. The first time I saw the Capital, I was very young... I'd never seen a waterfall before. I though they were so beautiful... I never dreamed one day I'd live in the palace.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: Well, tell me, did you dream of power and politics when you were a little girl?
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: (laughing) No! That was the last thing I thought of. My dream was to help in the "Refugee Relief Movement." I never thought of running for elected office. But the more history I studied, the more I realised how much good politicians could do. So when I was eight, I joined the "Apprentice Legislators", then later on became a Senatorial advisor, with such a passion that, before I knew it, I was elected Queen. Partly because I scored so high on my education certificate, but for the most part it was my conviction that reform was possible. I wasn't the youngest Queen ever elected, but now that I think back on it, I'm not sure I was old enough. I'm not sure I was ready.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: The people you served thought you did a good job. I heard they tried to amend the Constitution so you could stay in office.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: Popular rule is not democracy, Annie. It gives the people what they want, not what they need. And, truthfully, I was relieved when my two terms were up. So were my parents. They worried About me during the blockade and couldn't wait for it all to be over. Actually, I was hoping to have a family by now... My sisters have the most amazing, wonderful kids... but when the Queen asked me to serve as Senator, I couldn't refuse her.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: I agree! I think the Republic needs you... I'm glad you chose to serve. I feel things are going to happen in our generation that will change the galaxy in profound ways.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: I think so too.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, DEX'S DINER - MORNING

text: We've been worried about you. (takes her hand) I'm so glad you're safe, PADME.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Thank you, Your Highness. I only Wish I could have served you better by staying on Coruscant for the vote.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Given the circumstances, Senator, you know it was the only decision Her Highness could have made.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: How many systems have joined Count Dooku and the separatists?
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: About two hundred. And more are leaving the Republic every day. If the Senate votes to create an army, I'm sure it's going to push us into a civil war.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: It's unthinkable! There hasn't been a full-scale war since the formation of the Republic!
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Do you see any way, through negotiations, to bring the separatists back into the Republic?
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Not if they feel threatened. The separatists don't have an army, but if they are provoked, they will move to defend themselves. I'm sure of that. And with no time or money to build an army, my guess is they will turn to the Commerce Guilds or the Trade Federation for help.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: The armies of commerce! Why has Nothing been done in the Senate to restrain them?
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: I'm afraid that, despite the Chancellor's best efforts, there are still many bureaucrats, judges, and even Senators on the payrolls of the Guilds.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: It's outrageous! After all of those hearings, and the four trials in the Supreme Court, Nute Gunray is still the Viceroy of the Trade Federation. Do those money mongers control everything?
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Remember, Counsellor, the courts were able to reduce the Federation's armies. That's a move in the right direction.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: There are rumours, Your Highness, that the Federation Army was not reduced as they were ordered.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: The Jedi have not been allowed to investigate. It would be to be too dangerous for the economy, we were told.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: We must keep our faith in the Republic. The day we stop believing democracy can work is the day we lose it.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Let's pray that day never comes.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: In the meantime, we must consider your own safety.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: What is your suggestion, Master Jedi?
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Anakin's not a Jedi yet, Counsellor. He's still a Padawan learner. I was thinking...
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: (nettled) Hey, hold on a minute!
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Excuse me! I was thinking I would stay in the Lake Country. There are some places up there that are very isolated.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Excuse me?! I am in charge of security here, M'Lady.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Annie, my life is at risk, and this is my home. I know it very well... that is why we're here. I think it would be wise for you to take advantage of my knowledge in this instance.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: (takes a deep breath) Sorry, M'Lady.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: She is right. The Lake Country is the most remote part of Naboo. Not many people and a clear view of the surrounding terrain.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Perfect. It's settled then.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: PADME, I had an audience with your father yesterday. I told him what was happening. He hopes you will visit your mother before you leave... your family's very worried about you.
where: INT. NABOO PALACE, THRONE ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Did you call for assistance?
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: (distracted in thought) Yes... yes, I did...
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: He has a powerful face, doesn't he? He was one of the most brilliant Jedi I have had the privilege of knowing.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: I never understood why he quit. Only twenty Jedi have ever left the Order.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: The Lost Twenty... and COUNT DOKU was the most recent and the most painful. No one likes to talk about it. His leaving was a great loss to the Order.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: What happened?
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: Well, one might say, he was always a bit out of step with the decisions of the Council... much like your old Master, Qui-Gon Jinn.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: (surprised) Really?
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: Oh, yes. They were alike in many ways. Very individual thinkers... idealists...
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: He was always striving to become a more powerful Jedi. He wanted to be the best. With a lightsaber, in the old style of fencing, he had no match. His knowledge of the Force was... unique. In the end, I think he left because he lost faith in the Republic. He believed that politics were corrupt, and he felt the Jedi betrayed themselves by serving the politicians. He always had very high expectations of government. He disappeared for nine or ten years, then he just showed up recently as the head of the separatist movement.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: Interesting... I'm still not sure I understand.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: Well, I'm sure you didn't call me over here for a history lesson. Are you having a problem, Master Kenobi?
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: Yes, I'm trying to find a planet system called Kamino. It doesn't seem to show upon any of the archive charts.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: Kamino? It's not a system I'M familiar with... Let me see...
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: Are you sure you have the right co-ordinates?
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: (nodding) According to my information, it should be in this quadrant somewhere... just south of the Rishi Maze.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: No co-ordinates? It sounds like the kind of directions you'd get from a street tout... some old miner or Furbog trader.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: All three actually.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: Are you sure it exists?
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: Absolutely.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: Let me do a gravitational scan.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: There are some inconsistencies here. Maybe the planet you're looking for was destroyed.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: Wouldn't that be on record?
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: It ought to be. Unless it was very recent. (shakes her head) I hate to say it, but it looks like the system you're searching for doesn't exist.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: That's impossible... perhaps the archives are incomplete.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: The archives are comprehensive and totally secure, my young Jedi. One thing you may be absolutely sure of - if an item does not appear in our records, it does not exist!
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: There's my house!
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: (continuing) What? Don't say you're shy!
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: (untruthfully) No, but I...
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: Aunt Padme!! Aunt Padme!!
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: Ryoo!! Pooja!!
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: (continuing) I'm so happy to see you! This is Anakin. Anakin, this is Ryoo, and this is Pooja.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: ARTOO!!!
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, ARCHIVES LIBRARY - DAY

text: (over her shoulder) They're eating over at Jev Narran's later, Mom. They just had a snack. They'll be fine.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Anakin, this is my sister, Sola.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Hello, Anakin.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Hello.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: You're just in time for dinner. I hope you're hungry, Anakin.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: A little.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: He's being polite, Mom. We're starving.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: (grinning) You came to the right place at the right time. Sit down, son.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: (to Padme) Honey, it's so good to see you safe. We were so worried.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Dear...
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: I know, I know... but I had to say it. Now it's done.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Well, this is exciting! Do you know, Anakin, you're the first boyfriend my sister's ever brought home?
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: (rolls her eyes) Sola!! He isn't my boyfriend! He's a Jedi assigned by the Senate to protect me.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: A bodyguard?! Oh, Padme! They didn't tell us it was that serious!
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: It's not, Mom, I promise. (glances at Jobal) Anyway, Anakin's a friend. I've known him for years. Remember that little boy who was with the Jedi during the blockade crisis?
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: (continuing) He grew up.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Honey, when are you going to settle down? Haven't you had enough of that life? I certainly have!
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Mom, I'm not in any danger.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: (to Anakin) Is she?
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: ...Yes... I'm afraid she is.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: (quickly) But not much.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Sometimes I wish I'd traveled more... but I must say, I'm happy here.
where: EXT. PADME'S PARENTS' GARDEN - AFTERNOON

text: Padme tells me you teach at the university?
where: EXT. PADME'S PARENTS' GARDEN - AFTERNOON

text: (nodding) Yes, and before that, I was a builder. I also worked for the Refugee Relief Movement, when I was very young.
where: EXT. PADME'S PARENTS' GARDEN - AFTERNOON

text: Why haven't you told us about him?
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: What's there to talk about? He's just a boy.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: A boy? Have you seen the way he looks at you?
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Sola - stop it!
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: It's obvious he has feelings for you. Are you saying, little baby sister, that you haven't noticed?
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: I'm not your baby sister, Sola. Anakin and I are friends... our relationship is strictly professional. (to Jobal) Mom, would you tell her to stop it?
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: (laughing) Well, maybe you haven't noticed the way he looks at you. I think you're afraid to.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Cut it out.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Sola's just concerned... we all are.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Oh, Mom, you're impossible. What I'm doing is important.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: You've done your service, PADME. It's time you had a life of your own. You're missing so much!
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, MAIN ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Now tell me, son. How serious is this thing? How much danger is my daughter really in?
where: EXT. PADME'S PARENTS' GARDEN - AFTERNOON

text: There have been two attempts on her life. Chances are there'll be more. My Master is tracking down the assassins. I'm sure he'll find out who they are. This situation, won't last long.
where: EXT. PADME'S PARENTS' GARDEN - AFTERNOON

text: I don't want anything to happen to her.
where: EXT. PADME'S PARENTS' GARDEN - AFTERNOON

text: I don't either.
where: EXT. PADME'S PARENTS' GARDEN - AFTERNOON

text: Don't worry, this won't take long.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, PADME'S ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: I just want to get there before dark.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, PADME'S ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: (continuing) You still live at home.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, PADME'S ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: I move around so much, I've never had a place of my own. Official residences have no warmth. I feel good here. I feel at home.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, PADME'S ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: I never had a real home. Home was always where my Mom was.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, PADME'S ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: (continuing) Is this you?
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, PADME'S ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: That was when I went with the Relief Group to Shadda-Bi-Boran. Their sun was imploding, and the planet was dying. I was helping to relocate the children. See that little one I'm holding? His name was N'a-kee-tula, which means sweethear. He was so full of life,. All those kids were. I did everything I could to save him, but he died... they all did. They were never able to adapt... to live off their native planet.
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, PADME'S ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: (continuing) My first day as an Apprentice Legislator. Notice the difference?
where: INT. PADME'S PARENTS' HOUSE, PADME'S ROOM - AFTERNOON

text: Don't think... feel... be as one with the Force. Help you, it will. (he sees Obi-Wan) Younglings - enough! A visitor we have. Welcome him.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, TRAINING VERANDA - DAY

text: (continuing) Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, meet the mighty Bear Clan.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, TRAINING VERANDA - DAY

text: Welcome, Master Obi-Wan!
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, TRAINING VERANDA - DAY

text: I am sorry to disturb you, Master.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, TRAINING VERANDA - DAY

text: What help to you, can I be?
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, TRAINING VERANDA - DAY

text: I’m looking for a planet described to me by an old friend. I trust him. But the system doesn’t show up on the archive maps.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, TRAINING VERANDA - DAY

text: An interesting puzzle. Gather round the map reader, younglings. Master Obi-Wan has lost a planet. Find it, we will try...
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, TRAINING VERANDA - DAY

text: This is where it ought to be... but it isn’t. Gravity is pulling all the stars in this area inward to this spot. There should be a star here... but there isn’t.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, TRAINING VERANDA - DAY

text: Most interesting. Gravity’s silhouette remains, but the star and all its planets have disappeared. How can this be?
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, TRAINING VERANDA - DAY

text: Because someone erased it from the archive memory.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, TRAINING VERANDA - DAY

text: That’s right! Yes! That’s what happened! Someone erased it!
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, TRAINING VERANDA - DAY

text: If the planet blew up, the gravity would go away.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, TRAINING VERANDA - DAY

text: Truly wonderful, the mind of a child is. Uncluttered. To the centre of the pull of gravity go, and find your planet you will.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, TRAINING VERANDA - DAY

text: But Master Yoda who could have erased information from the archives? That’s impossible, isn’t it?
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, TRAINING VERANDA - DAY

text: (frowning) Much harder to answer, that question is.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, TRAINING VERANDA - DAY

text: When I was in Level Three, we used to come here for school retreat. See that island? We used to swim there every day. I love the water.
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, GARDEN TERRACEM LATE AFTERNOON

text: I do too. I guess it comes from growing up on a desert planet.
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, GARDEN TERRACEM LATE AFTERNOON

text: ...We used to lie on the sand and let the sun dry us... and try to guess the names of the birds singing.
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, GARDEN TERRACEM LATE AFTERNOON

text: I don’t like sand. It’s coarse and rough and irritating, and it gets everywhere. Not like here. Here everything’s soft... and smooth...
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, GARDEN TERRACEM LATE AFTERNOON

text: There was a very old man who lived on the island. He used to make glass out of sand - and vases and necklaces out of the glass. They were magical.
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, GARDEN TERRACEM LATE AFTERNOON

text: (looks into her eyes) Everything here is magical.
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, GARDEN TERRACEM LATE AFTERNOON

text: You could look into the glass and see the water. The way it ripples and moves. It looked so real... but it wasn’t.
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, GARDEN TERRACEM LATE AFTERNOON

text: Sometimes, when you believe something to be real, it becomes real. Real enough, anyway...
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, GARDEN TERRACEM LATE AFTERNOON

text: I used to think if you looked too deeply into glass, you would lose yourself.
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, GARDEN TERRACEM LATE AFTERNOON

text: I think it's true...
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, GARDEN TERRACEM LATE AFTERNOON

text: I shouldn't have done that.
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, GARDEN TERRACEM LATE AFTERNOON

text: I'm sorry. When I'm around you, my mind is no longer my own.
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, GARDEN TERRACEM LATE AFTERNOON

text: It's the situation... the stress...
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, GARDEN TERRACEM LATE AFTERNOON

text: ...the view.
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, GARDEN TERRACEM LATE AFTERNOON

text: Be wary, this disturbance in the Force is growing stronger.
where: EXT. CORUSCANT, LANDING PLATFORM - LATE AFTERNOON

text: I am concerned for my Padawan. He is not ready to be on his own.
where: EXT. CORUSCANT, LANDING PLATFORM - LATE AFTERNOON

text: The Council is confident in this decision, Obi-Wan.
where: EXT. CORUSCANT, LANDING PLATFORM - LATE AFTERNOON

text: He has exceptional skills. The Council is confident in its decision, Obi-Wan. If the prophecy is true, he weill be the one to bring balance to the Force.
where: EXT. CORUSCANT, LANDING PLATFORM - LATE AFTERNOON

text: But he still has much to learn. And his abilities have made him... well... arrogant. I realise now what you and Master Yoda knew from the beginning... the boy was too old to start the training and...
where: EXT. CORUSCANT, LANDING PLATFORM - LATE AFTERNOON

text: There's something else?
where: EXT. CORUSCANT, LANDING PLATFORM - LATE AFTERNOON

text: Master, he should not have been given this assignment. I'm afraid Anakin won't be able to protect the Senator.
where: EXT. CORUSCANT, LANDING PLATFORM - LATE AFTERNOON

text: Why?
where: EXT. CORUSCANT, LANDING PLATFORM - LATE AFTERNOON

text: He has a... an emotional connection with her. It's been there since he was boy. Now he's confused... distracted.
where: EXT. CORUSCANT, LANDING PLATFORM - LATE AFTERNOON

text: Obi-Wan, you must have faith that he will take the right path.
where: EXT. CORUSCANT, LANDING PLATFORM - LATE AFTERNOON

text: Has Master Yoda gained any insight into whether or not this war will come about?
where: EXT. CORUSCANT, LANDING PLATFORM - LATE AFTERNOON

text: Probing the Dark Side is a dangerous process. He could be in seclusion for days... May the force be with you.
where: EXT. CORUSCANT, LANDING PLATFORM - LATE AFTERNOON

text: You did that?
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, DINING ROOM - LATE AFTERNOON

text: What?
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, DINING ROOM - LATE AFTERNOON

text: That! Now stop it!
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, DINING ROOM - LATE AFTERNOON

text: (continuing) Anakin!!
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, DINING ROOM - LATE AFTERNOON

text: I'm not really supposed to do that... for fun, I mean. If Master Obi-Wan were here, he'd be very grumpy.
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, DINING ROOM - LATE AFTERNOON

text: May I tell you something?
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, FIREPLACE ALCOVE - TWILIGHT

text: I don't know.
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, FIREPLACE ALCOVE - TWILIGHT

text: Then how can I tell you?
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, FIREPLACE ALCOVE - TWILIGHT

text: Maybe you should use your Jedi intuition.
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, FIREPLACE ALCOVE - TWILIGHT

text: It doesn't work around you. My mind is always a muddle... I can only think of you.
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, FIREPLACE ALCOVE - TWILIGHT

text: Anakin, don't...
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, FIREPLACE ALCOVE - TWILIGHT

text: From the moment I met you, all those years ago, a day hasn't gone by when I haven't thought of you. And now that I'm close to you again, I'm in agony. The closer I get to you, the worse it gets. The thought of not being with you mskes my stomach turn over - my mouth goes dry. I feel dizzy. I can't breathe. I'm haunted by the kiss you should never have given me. My heart is beating, hoping that kiss will not become a scar. You are in my very soul, tormenting me. What can I do? I will do anything you ask...
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, FIREPLACE ALCOVE - TWILIGHT

text: (continuing) If you are suffering as much as I am, tell me.
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, FIREPLACE ALCOVE - TWILIGHT

text: ...I can't. We can't. It's just not possible.
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, FIREPLACE ALCOVE - TWILIGHT

text: Anything's possible. Padme, please listen...
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, FIREPLACE ALCOVE - TWILIGHT

text: You listen. We live in a real world. Come back to it. You're studying to become a Jedi Knight. I'm a Senator. If you follow your thoughts through to conclusion, they will take us to a place we cannot go... regardless of the way we feel about each other.
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, FIREPLACE ALCOVE - TWILIGHT

text: Then you do feel something! There's an extraordinary connection between us. You can't deny that.
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, FIREPLACE ALCOVE - TWILIGHT

text: Annie, it doesn't make any difference. Jedi aren't allowed to marry. You swore an oath, remember? You'd be expelled from the Order. I will not let you give up your responsibilities... your future, for me.
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, FIREPLACE ALCOVE - TWILIGHT

text: I was destined to be a Jedi. I don't think I could be anything else. But you are asking me to be rational. That is something I know I cannot do. I wish I could wish my feelings away... but I can't.
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, FIREPLACE ALCOVE - TWILIGHT

text: I am not going to give into this. I'm not going to throw my life away. I have more important things to do than fall in love.
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, FIREPLACE ALCOVE - TWILIGHT

text: It wouldn't have to be that way... we could keep it a secret.
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, FIREPLACE ALCOVE - TWILIGHT

text: Then we'd be living a lie - one we couldn't keep even if we wanted to. Mt sister saw it. So did my mother. I couldn't do that. Could you, Anakin? Could you live like that?
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, FIREPLACE ALCOVE - TWILIGHT

text: ...No, you're right. It would destroy us.
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, FIREPLACE ALCOVE - TWILIGHT

text: Welcome to Tipoca City, Master Jedi.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CORRIDOR ENTRANCE

text: Everything is ready. The Prime Minister expects you.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CORRIDOR ENTRANCE

text: (warily) I'm expected?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CORRIDOR ENTRANCE

text: Of course! He is anxious to see you. After all these years, we were beginning to think you weren't coming. Now please, this way!
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CORRIDOR ENTRANCE

text: May I present Lama Su, Prime Minister of Kamino... and this is Master Jedi...
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, PRIME MINISTER OFFICE - DAY

text: Obi-Wan Kenobi.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, PRIME MINISTER OFFICE - DAY

text: Please...
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, PRIME MINISTER OFFICE - DAY

text: I trust you are going to enjoy your stay. We are most happy you have arrived at the best part of the season.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, PRIME MINISTER OFFICE - DAY

text: You make me feel most welcome.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, PRIME MINISTER OFFICE - DAY

text: And now to business. You will be delighted to hear we are on schedule. Two hundred thousand units are ready, with another million well on the way.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, PRIME MINISTER OFFICE - DAY

text: (improvising) That is... good news.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, PRIME MINISTER OFFICE - DAY

text: Please tell your Master Sido-Dyas that we have every confidence his order will be met on time and in full. He is well, I hope?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, PRIME MINISTER OFFICE - DAY

text: I'm sorry Master - ?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, PRIME MINISTER OFFICE - DAY

text: Jedi Master Sifo-Dyas. He's still a leading member of the Jedi Council, is he not?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, PRIME MINISTER OFFICE - DAY

text: Oh, yes. Sido-Dyas.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, PRIME MINISTER OFFICE - DAY

text: (rising) You must be anxious to inspect the units for yourself.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, PRIME MINISTER OFFICE - DAY

text: That's why I'm here.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, PRIME MINISTER OFFICE - DAY

text: I don't know...
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: Sure you do... you just don't want to tell me.
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: Are you going to use one of your Jedi mind tricks on me?
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: They only work on the weak-minded. You are anything but weak-minded.
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: All right... his name was Palo. I was twelve. We were both in the Legislative Youth Program. He was a few years older then I... very cute... dark curly hair... dreamy eyes.
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: All right, I get the picture... whatever happened to him?
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: I went on to become a Queen. He went on to become an artist.
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: Maybe he was the smart one.
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: You really don't like politicians, do you?
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: I like two or three, but I'm not really sure about one of them. (smiling) I don't think the system works.
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: How would you have it work?
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: We need a system where the politicians sit down and discuss the problems, agree what's in the best interests of all the people, and then do it.
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: That is exactly what we do. The trouble is that people don't wlways agree. In fact, they hardly ever do.
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: Then they should be made to.
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: By whom? Who's going to make them?
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: I don't know. Someone.
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: You?
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: Of course not me.
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: But someone.
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: Someone wise.
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: That sounds an awful lot like a dictatorship to me.
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: Well, if it works...
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: You're making fun of me.
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: (sarcastic) On no, I'd be much too frightened to tease a Senator.
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: You're so bad!
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: You're always so serious. Always carrying the weight of the universe on your shoulders.
where: EXT. NABOO, MOUNTAIN MEADOW - LATER AFTERNOON

text: (beaming) Magnificent, aren't they?
where: EXT. TIPOCA CITY, PARADE GROUND (RAINSTORM) - DAY

text: We modified their genetic structure to make them less independent than the original host. As a result they are totally obedient, taking any order without question.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CLONE CENTER, COMMINSSARY - DAY

text: Who was the original host?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CLONE CENTER, COMMINSSARY - DAY

text: A bounty hunter called Jango Fett. We felt a Jedi would be the perfect choice, but Sido-Dyas hand- picked Jango Fett himself.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CLONE CENTER, COMMINSSARY - DAY

text: Where is this bounty hunter now?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CLONE CENTER, COMMINSSARY - DAY

text: Oh, we keep him here. After a few hundred thousand clones, the genetic pattern starts to fade, so we take a fresh supply. He lives here, but he's free to come and go as he pleases.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CLONE CENTER, COMMINSSARY - DAY

text: Apart from his pay, which is considerable, Fett demanded only one thing - an unaltered clone for himself. Curious isn't it?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CLONE CENTER, BARRACKS - DAY

text: Unaltered?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CLONE CENTER, BARRACKS - DAY

text: Pure genetic replication. No tampering with the structure to make it more docile... and no growth acceleration...
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CLONE CENTER, BARRACKS - DAY

text: I would like to meet this *JANGO FETT
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CLONE CENTER, BARRACKS - DAY

text: I would be most happy to arrange it, for you.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CLONE CENTER, BARRACKS - DAY

text: You mentioned growth acceleration...
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CLONE CENTER, CLASSROOM - DAY

text: Oh yes, it's essential. Otherwise, a mature clone would take a lifetime to grow. Now, we can do it in half the time. Those items you saw on the parade ground were started ten years ago, when Sido-dyas first placed the order, and they're already mature...
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CLONE CENTER, CLASSROOM - DAY

text: And these?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CLONE CENTER, CLASSROOM - DAY

text: About five years ago.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CLONE CENTER, CLASSROOM - DAY

text: They're immensely superior to droids, capable of independent thought and action.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CLONE CENTER, HATCHERY - DAY

text: Very impressive.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CLONE CENTER, HATCHERY - DAY

text: I'd hoped you would be pleased.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CLONE CENTER, HATCHERY - DAY

text: (carefully) Tell me, prime minister, when my Master Sido-dyas first contacted you, did he say the order was for... himself... or?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CLONE CENTER, HATCHERY - DAY

text: Himself? Of course not. This army is for the Republic?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CLONE CENTER, HATCHERY - DAY

text: (astonished) The Repubic?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CLONE CENTER, HATCHERY - DAY

text: We are also very much agasint this Count Dooku and his seccessionist movement. We are proud to be of help to the Republic.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CLONE CENTER, HATCHERY - DAY

text: I have arranged for you to meet Jango Fett in the morning. Sleep well.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, APARTMENT - LATE DAY

text: Arfour, Arfour...
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, APARTMENT - LATE DAY

text: Arfour, relay this, "scramble code five," to Courscant: care of "the old folks home."
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, APARTMENT - LATE DAY

text: ...I've never heard of a Jedi called Sido-Dyas, have you, Master?
where: EXT. JEDI TEMPLE, LIVINF QUARTERS - EARLY EVENING

text: No. Whoever placed that order was not a Jedi, I can assure you.
where: EXT. JEDI TEMPLE, LIVINF QUARTERS - EARLY EVENING

text: I have a strong feeling that this bounty hunter is the assassin we're looking for.
where: EXT. JEDI TEMPLE, LIVINF QUARTERS - EARLY EVENING

text: Who he is working for... discover that, you must.
where: EXT. JEDI TEMPLE, LIVINF QUARTERS - EARLY EVENING

text: I will, Master, and I will also find out more about this clone army... May The Force...
where: EXT. JEDI TEMPLE, LIVINF QUARTERS - EARLY EVENING

text: A clone army! Ordered by someone in the Senate perhaps... Someone's out to start a war.
where: EXT. JEDI TEMPLE, LIVINF QUARTERS - EARLY EVENING

text: Inform the chancellor of this, we must.
where: EXT. JEDI TEMPLE, LIVINF QUARTERS - EARLY EVENING

text: Who do you think this impostor Sido-Dyas, could be?
where: EXT. JEDI TEMPLE, LIVINF QUARTERS - EARLY EVENING

text: No...No...No...Mom!...Don't, no, don't!
where: INT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, ANAKIN'S BEDROOM - NIGHT

text: (eyes closed) Don't go.
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, BALCONY OVERLOOKING GARDENS - MORNING

text: I don't want to disturb you.
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, BALCONY OVERLOOKING GARDENS - MORNING

text: Your presence is soothing.
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, BALCONY OVERLOOKING GARDENS - MORNING

text: You had a nightmare again last night.
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, BALCONY OVERLOOKING GARDENS - MORNING

text: Jedi don't have nightmares.
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, BALCONY OVERLOOKING GARDENS - MORNING

text: I heard you.
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, BALCONY OVERLOOKING GARDENS - MORNING

text: I saw my mother. I saw her as clearly as I see you now. She's suffering, Padme. She is in pain...They're killing her! (getting up) I know I'm disobeying my mandate to protect you, Senator. I know I will be punished and possibly thrown out of the Jedi Order, but I must go. I have to help her! I'm sorry, Padme. I don't have a choice.
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, BALCONY OVERLOOKING GARDENS - MORNING

text: Annie, I told you I wouldn't let you give up your future for me. I'll go with you. That way you can continue to protect me, and you won't be disobeying your mandate.
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, BALCONY OVERLOOKING GARDENS - MORNING

text: What about Master Obi-wan?
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, BALCONY OVERLOOKING GARDENS - MORNING

text: I guess we won't tell him, will we?
where: EXT. NABOO LAKE RETREAT, LODGE, BALCONY OVERLOOKING GARDENS - MORNING

text: Boba, is your father here?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CORRIDOR - DAY

text: (continuing) May we see him?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CORRIDOR - DAY

text: Sure.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CORRIDOR - DAY

text: Dad! Taun We's here!
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: Welcome back, Jango. Was your trip productive?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: Fairly.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: This is Jedi Master, *OBI-WAN
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: That right?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: Your clones are very impressive. You must be very proud.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: I'm just a simple man, trying to make my way in the universe, Master Jedi.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: Aren't we all?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: (continuing) Ever made your way as far into the interior as Coruscant?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: Once or twice.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: Recently?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: (eyes Obi-Wan carefully) Possibly...
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: Then you must know Master Sido- Dyas?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: Boba, close the door.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: (continuing) Master who?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: Sido-Dyas. Isn’t he the Jedi who hired you for this job?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: Never heard of him. I was recuited by a man called Darth Tyranus on one of the moons of Bogden.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: No? I thought...
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: Sido-Dyas told us to expect him. And he showed up just when your Jedi Master said he would. We have kept the Jedi’s involvement a secret until your arrival, just as your Master requested.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: Curious...
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: Do you like your army?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: It seems to me it's your army - being that they are all clones of you.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: (grinning) They'll do their job well, I'll guarantee that.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: I look forward to seeing them in action. Thank you for your time, Jango.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: Always a pleasure to meet a Jedi.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: What is it, Dad?
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, FETT APARTMENT - DAY

text: (to the droid driver) Wait, please.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, MOS ESPA STREETS AND WATTO'S SHIP - DAY

text: (yelling, in Huttese) No, not that one - that one!
where: EXT. TATOOINE, MOS ESPA STREETS AND WATTO'S SHIP - DAY

text: (arriving) Excuse me, Watto.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, MOS ESPA STREETS AND WATTO'S SHIP - DAY

text: (in Huttese) What?
where: EXT. TATOOINE, MOS ESPA STREETS AND WATTO'S SHIP - DAY

text: (in Huttese) I said excuse me.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, MOS ESPA STREETS AND WATTO'S SHIP - DAY

text: (in Huttese) Shut down.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, MOS ESPA STREETS AND WATTO'S SHIP - DAY

text: (continuing, in Huttese) What? I don't know you... What can I do for you? You look like a Jedi. Whatever it is... I didn't do it.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, MOS ESPA STREETS AND WATTO'S SHIP - DAY

text: Let me help you with that.
