where: EXT. TATOOINE, MOS ESPA STREETS AND WATTO'S SHIP - DAY

text: (continuing) I'm looking for Shmi Skywalker.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, MOS ESPA STREETS AND WATTO'S SHIP - DAY

text: Annie?? Little Annie?? Naaaah!!
where: EXT. TATOOINE, MOS ESPA STREETS AND WATTO'S SHIP - DAY

text: (continuing; in English) You are Annie! It is you! You little womp rat.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, MOS ESPA STREETS AND WATTO'S SHIP - DAY

text: (continuing) You sure sprouted Weehoo! A Jedi! Waddya know? Hey, maybe you couldda help wit some daedbeats who owe...
where: EXT. TATOOINE, MOS ESPA STREETS AND WATTO'S SHIP - DAY

text: My mother...
where: EXT. TATOOINE, MOS ESPA STREETS AND WATTO'S SHIP - DAY

text: Oh, yeah. Shmi... she's not mine no more. I sold her.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, MOS ESPA STREETS AND WATTO'S SHIP - DAY

text: Sold her...
where: EXT. TATOOINE, MOS ESPA STREETS AND WATTO'S SHIP - DAY

text: Years ago. Sorry, Anne, but you know, business is business. Sold her to a moisture farmer named Lars. Least I think it was Lars. Believe it or not, I heard he freed her and married her. Can ya beat that?
where: EXT. TATOOINE, MOS ESPA STREETS AND WATTO'S SHIP - DAY

text: Do you know where they are?
where: EXT. TATOOINE, MOS ESPA STREETS AND WATTO'S SHIP - DAY

text: Long way from here... someplace over on the other side of Mos Eisley, I think...
where: EXT. TATOOINE, MOS ESPA STREETS AND WATTO'S SHIP - DAY

text: I'd like to know.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, MOS ESPA STREETS AND WATTO'S SHIP - DAY

text: Yeah... sure... absolutely. Let's go look in my records.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, MOS ESPA STREETS AND WATTO'S SHIP - DAY

text: Tell your Council the first battalions are ready. And remind them that if they need more troops, we will need time to grow them.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CORRIDOR - DAY

text: I won't forget.
where: INT. TIPOCA CITY, CORRIDOR - DAY

text: Dad!!
where: EXT. TIPOCA CITY, KAMINO LANDING PLATFORM (RAINSTORM) - DAY

text: Stay with the ship, ARTOO.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, BLUFF OVERLOOKING HOMESTEAD - LATE DAY

text: Good evening. May I help you?
where: EXT. TATOOINE, DESERT, HOMESTEAD MOISTURE FARM - LATE DAY

text: THREEPIO?
where: EXT. TATOOINE, DESERT, HOMESTEAD MOISTURE FARM - LATE DAY

text: Oh, my... oh, my! Master Anakin! My goodness, I can hardly believe it! And this must be Miss Padme.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, DESERT, HOMESTEAD MOISTURE FARM - LATE DAY

text: Hello, THREEPIO.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, DESERT, HOMESTEAD MOISTURE FARM - LATE DAY

text: I've come to see my mother.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, DESERT, HOMESTEAD MOISTURE FARM - LATE DAY

text: Oh, dear! I'm so terribly sorry, Master Annie.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, DESERT, HOMESTEAD MOISTURE FARM - LATE DAY

text: THREEPIO, what's happened?
where: EXT. TATOOINE, DESERT, HOMESTEAD MOISTURE FARM - LATE DAY

text: I think we'd better go inside.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, DESERT, HOMESTEAD MOISTURE FARM - LATE DAY

text: Master Lars - Master Owen! Somebody to see you!
where: EXT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, COURTYARD - LATE DAY

text: I'm Anakin Skywalker. I'm here looking for my mother.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, COURTYARD - LATE DAY

text: Owen Lars... I guess I'm your step-brother. (they shake hands) This is my girlfriend, Beru.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, COURTYARD - LATE DAY

text: Hello.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, COURTYARD - LATE DAY

text: I'm Padme.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, COURTYARD - LATE DAY

text: I had a feeling you might show up some day.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, COURTYARD - LATE DAY

text: Is my mother here?
where: EXT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, COURTYARD - LATE DAY

text: No, she's not.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, COURTYARD - LATE DAY

text: (continuing) Cliegg Lars. Shmi is my wife... Come on inside. We have a lot to talk about.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, COURTYARD - LATE DAY

text: It was just before dawn. They came out of nowhere. A hunting party of Tusekn Raiders.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, KITCHEN - LATE DAY

text: Your mother had gone out early, like she always did, to pick mushrooms that grow on the vaporatos. From the tracks, she was about halfway when they took her. Those Tuskens walk like men, but they're vicious, mindless monsters. Thirty of us went out after her. Four of us came back. Three more are still out there looking. I'd be with them, only... I just couldn't ride any more... until I heal.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, DINING AREA - LATE DAY

text: (continuing) This isn't the way I wanted to meet you, son. This isn't how your mother and I planned it. I don't want to give up on her, but she's been gone a month. There's little hope she's lasted this long.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, DINING AREA - LATE DAY

text: Where are you going?
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, DINING AREA - LATE DAY

text: To find my mother.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, DINING AREA - LATE DAY

text: No, Annie!
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, DINING AREA - LATE DAY

text: She's dead, son. Accept it.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, DINING AREA - LATE DAY

text: I can feel her pain, and I will find her. I know she's alive.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, DINING AREA - LATE DAY

text: You are going to have to stay here. These are good people, Padme. You'll be safe.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, MOISTURE FARM - LATE DAY

text: Take my speeder bike.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, MOISTURE FARM - LATE DAY

text: Anakin...
where: EXT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, MOISTURE FARM - LATE DAY

text: I trust you'll watch over her, Owen.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, MOISTURE FARM - LATE DAY

text: Don't worry.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, MOISTURE FARM - LATE DAY

text: I won't be long.
where: EXT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, MOISTURE FARM - LATE DAY

text: Nearly there, son.
where: INT. COCKPIT, FETT SHIP, SPACE, GEONOSIS

text: Dad, look!!
where: INT. COCKPIT, FETT SHIP, SPACE, GEONOSIS

text: Hang on!
where: INT. COCKPIT, FETT SHIP, SPACE, GEONOSIS

text: Dad! Watch out!
where: EXT. SPACE, GEONOSIS

text: Stay calm, son. We'll be fine. That Jedi won't be able to follow us through this.
where: EXT. SPACE, GEONOSIS

text: Got him! Yeahhhhh!
where: EXT. SPACE, GEONOSIS

text: We won't see him again.
where: EXT. SPACE, GEONOSIS

text: Please don't leave us, Miss Padme. These people need your help.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD - GARAGE (FULL MOON) - NIGHT

text: I'm not leaving, THREEPIO. I just can't sleep.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD - GARAGE (FULL MOON) - NIGHT

text: That's something I cannot relate to. As a Protocol Droid, I'm either active or inactive. There's no in-between.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD - GARAGE (FULL MOON) - NIGHT

text: I guess you're lucky.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD - GARAGE (FULL MOON) - NIGHT

text: Do you really think so..? I suppose I shouldn't expect...
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD - GARAGE (FULL MOON) - NIGHT

text: You're not happy here?
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD - GARAGE (FULL MOON) - NIGHT

text: Oh, I'm not unhappy... and my masters here ar so kind I wouldn't wish to trouuble them, it's just... being like this... well, it's embarrassing.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD - GARAGE (FULL MOON) - NIGHT

text: Being like what?
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD - GARAGE (FULL MOON) - NIGHT

text: Naked. If you pardon the expression. You see, when Master Annie made me, he never quite found the time to give me any outer covering. It's so humiliating. How would you like it if you had to go around with all your circuits showing?
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD - GARAGE (FULL MOON) - NIGHT

text: I guess I wouldn't like it at all.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD - GARAGE (FULL MOON) - NIGHT

text: Of course you wouldn't. Nobody would. It's simply not protocol.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD - GARAGE (FULL MOON) - NIGHT

text: Maybe we can do something about it.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD - GARAGE (FULL MOON) - NIGHT

text: I don't think so. Only Master Annie...
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD - GARAGE (FULL MOON) - NIGHT

text: Why not? They seem to have a box of old coverings here.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD - GARAGE (FULL MOON) - NIGHT

text: Oh? How observant of you, Miss Padme. Of course, I'm just not mechanically minded... if you see what I mean.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD - GARAGE (FULL MOON) - NIGHT

text: Let's see, if we put this... here...
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD - GARAGE (FULL MOON) - NIGHT

text: Ooooh! That's tickles.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD - GARAGE (FULL MOON) - NIGHT

text: You'll have to be quiet, THREEPIO. Hold still, please.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD - GARAGE (FULL MOON) - NIGHT

text: Mom... Mom... Mom...
where: INT. TUSKEN RAIDER HUTT - NIGHT

text: Annie...? Is it you?
where: INT. TUSKEN RAIDER HUTT - NIGHT

text: I’m here, Mom. You’re safe. Hang on. I’m going to get you out of here...
where: INT. TUSKEN RAIDER HUTT - NIGHT

text: I’m so glad... to see you, Annie... Now... I am complete...
where: INT. TUSKEN RAIDER HUTT - NIGHT

text: Just stay with me, Mom. I’m going to make you well again. Everything’s going to be fine.
where: INT. TUSKEN RAIDER HUTT - NIGHT

text: You look so handsome. My son... my grown-up son. I’m so proud of you, Annie... so proud... I missed you so much... I love...
where: INT. TUSKEN RAIDER HUTT - NIGHT

text: "Guiding light" to "old folks home."
where: EXT. GEONOSIS, LANDING AREA - NIGHT

text: ...Starships from the Trade Federation and the Commerce Guilds are taking deliveries of battle droids from the foundries on Geonosis.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: That's outrageous! The treaty forbids the Trade Federation from building up an army. What are they doing?!
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: The droid foundry seems to be working at full capacity. I am going to go down and investigate. I will bring Jango Fett back home for interrogation.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: Those Geonosian foundries are part of the Techno Union. We will call in their representatives and ask them a few very pointed questions.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: One more thing. Jango mentioned he was recruited by someone named Darth Tyranus. Any idea who that might be?
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: With the forename Darth, a Sith he must be.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: Our missing apprentice. They are playing their hand at last.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: Do you believe he could be the mysterious Sido-Dyas, who made the deal for the clone army?
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: Perhaps too many pieces are missing from this puzzle, there are.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: Be careful, Obi-Wan. This investigation is becoming less than routine. Do you need help?
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: Let me see if I can figure out what's going on first.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: The Commerce Guilds are preparing for war... there can be no doubt of that.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: Count Dooku must have made a treaty with them.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: We must stop them soon before they're fully ready.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: The debate is over, we need that clone army now!
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: Unfortunately, the debate is not over. The Senate will never be able to approve the use of that army before the separatists attack.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: This is a crisis! If the Senate votes the Chancellor emergency powers, he could approve the use of the army in a minute.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: Please, please, I don't wish to have emergency powers. That's too extreme a solution. It's akin to a dictatorship. We must rely on the Jedi. Master Yoda, how many are available to go to Geonosis?
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: Two Hundred,... less or more.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: With all due respect for the Jedi Order, two hundred will be no match for hundreds of thousands of battle droids.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: Patience. We should wait for Obi- Wan to report back. We don't know that Count Dooku has made a treaty with the Corporate Alliance, it's speculation.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: But we must prepare for the worst. I'm going to propose a motion granting emergency powers to the Chancellor at the next session. We must not wait!
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: Out of the question, Senator! You and I are too closely aligned. The issue will become partisan and debates will begin. The proposal must come from a neutral source.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: If only Senator Amidala were here.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: Supreme Chancellor... my august colleagues, I would be proud to propose the motion in question. This is a grave situation, and I'm sure Senator Amidala, and the Queen of Naboo would agree.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: Thank you, Representative Binks.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: If called upon, I will serve. But it will be the saddest day of my life.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, CHANCELLOR'S OFFICE

text: There!
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, GARAGE - DAY

text: Um. How do I look?
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, GARAGE - DAY

text: Great! You look perfect.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, GARAGE - DAY

text: Perfect? Oh, Miss Padme, I'm so happy! (extending his hand to shake hers) Oh, pardon me.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, GARAGE - DAY

text: (continuing) Thank you.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, GARAGE - DAY

text: (continuing) Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, GARAGE - DAY

text: (grinning) Well, Padme, I think he should be yours from now on... I know that is what my Mom would want.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, GARAGE - DAY

text: Oh, my!
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, GARAGE - DAY

text: Come topside, everybody! He's back! He's back!
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, GARAGE - DAY

text: ...Alliance have pledged their armies to Count Dooku and are forming an... Wait!... ah... attack... I don't... make it... aaaggghhh!
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, GARAGE - DAY

text: I'm going after him!
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, GARAGE - DAY

text: I thought the first thing he said was to retransmit his message to Coruscant.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, GARAGE - DAY

text: Yeah, you're right, you're right.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, GARAGE - DAY

text: We will deal with Count Dooku. The most important thing for you, Anakin, is to stay where you are. Protect the Senator at all costs. That is your priority.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, GARAGE - DAY

text: Understood, Master.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, GARAGE - DAY

text: They'll never get there in time to save him. They have to come half way across the galaxy. Look, Geonosis is less than a parsec away.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, GARAGE - DAY

text: If he's still alive.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, GARAGE - DAY

text: Annie, are you just going to sit here and let him die?? He's your friend... your mentor...
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, GARAGE - DAY

text: ...He's like my father, but you heard Master Windu. He gave me strict orders to stay here.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, GARAGE - DAY

text: He gave you strict orders to protect me...
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, GARAGE - DAY

text: (continuing) ...and I'm going to save Obi-Wan. So if you plan to protect me, you will have to come along.
where: INT. TATOOINE, HOMESTEAD, GARAGE - DAY

text: The longer we wait, the stronger Dooku's armies become. We cannot wait for the Senate to make up its mind about granting the Chancellor emergency powers, in order to be able to use that clone army... We have the authority to go now. We must go now.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, JEDI TEMPLE, COUNCIL CHAMBER - DAY

text: Agreed, Master Windu. Two hundred Jedi send. Enough, let's hope they are.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, JEDI TEMPLE, COUNCIL CHAMBER - DAY

text: Order! Order!!
where: INT. CORUSCANT, MAIN SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: In the regrettable absence of Senator Amidala, the chair recognises Senior Representative of Naboo, JAR JAR Binks.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, MAIN SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: Senators, dellow felagates...
where: INT. CORUSCANT, MAIN SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: Order! The Senate will accord the Representative the courtesy of a hearing!
where: INT. CORUSCANT, MAIN SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: In response to the direct threat to the Republic from the Confederacy of Independent Systems, I propose that the Senate gives immediate emergency powers to the Supreme Chancellor.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, MAIN SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: (continuing) Who can deny these are exceptional times? Exceptional times demand exceptional measures! Exceptional measures demand exceptional men!
where: INT. CORUSCANT, MAIN SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: We won't support a dictator.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, MAIN SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: That is the sentiment every one of us agrees with! And when the shadow of war has dispersed and the bright day of liberty has dawned once again, the power we now give to the Supreme Chancellor will be gladly, and swiftly returned. Out ancient liberties will be restored to us, burnished even more brightly than before!
where: INT. CORUSCANT, MAIN SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: It is with great reluctance that I have agreed to this calling. I love democracy... I love the Republic. The fact that this crisis is demanding I be given absolute power to tule over you is evident. But I am mild by nature and have no desire to destroy the democratic process. The power you give me I will lay down when this crisis has abated, I promise you. And all I ask in return is when my current term of office is over, you allow me to reture and live out my life in peace.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, MAIN SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: We shall proceed to the vote. All those in favor of granting emergency powers to the Supreme Chancellor, signal ate at this time... those opposed?
where: INT. CORUSCANT, MAIN SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: Hey, where are you going?
where: INT. CORUSCANT, MAIN SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: To find Obi-Wan.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, MAIN SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: No! You're not!
where: INT. CORUSCANT, MAIN SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: Let go of me!
where: INT. CORUSCANT, MAIN SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: I'm not letting you go out there. It's too dangerous.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, MAIN SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: What?!?
where: INT. CORUSCANT, MAIN SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: It's my job to protect you. I said it's too dangerous. You're not going, and that's final!
where: INT. CORUSCANT, MAIN SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: Don't you give me orders, Annie! I'm a Senator of the Galactic Republic. You have no authority to contain me, restrain me, or direct me! You remember your place, young man. (standing up) Now you can come along and protect me or stay here. It's up to you.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, MAIN SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: Yes, it is, ARTOO. Most confusing. One moment they're generating a pleasant mutual attraction and the next, waves of violent hostility. Even though I'm programmed to understand them, I doubt if I ever shall.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, MAIN SENATE CHAMBER - DAY

text: (in a low voice) It's empty!
where: INT. GEONOSIS, CORRIDORS - DAY

text: Wait!
where: INT. GEONOSIS, CENTRAL SQUARE - DAY

text: Senator Amidala, I've heard so much about you.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, CENTRAL SQUARE - DAY

text: Count Dooku, I assume.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, CENTRAL SQUARE - DAY

text: I'm delighted to meet you at last. We have a great deal to discuss, Senator. I hope you can keep your young Jedi under control.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, CENTRAL SQUARE - DAY

text: Don't worry he's housebroken.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, CENTRAL SQUARE - DAY

text: You are holding a Jedi Knight, Obi- Wan Kenobi. I am formally requesting you turn him over to me, now.
where: INT. CONFERENCE ROOM (GEONOSIS) - DAY

text: He has been convicted of espionage, Senator, and will be executed. In just a few hours, I believe.
where: INT. CONFERENCE ROOM (GEONOSIS) - DAY

text: He is an officer of the Republic. You can't do that.
where: INT. CONFERENCE ROOM (GEONOSIS) - DAY

text: We don't recognise the Republic here, Senator. But if Naboo were to join our Alliance, I could easily hear your plea for clemency.
where: INT. CONFERENCE ROOM (GEONOSIS) - DAY

text: And if I don't join your rebellion, I assume this Jedi with me will also die?
where: INT. CONFERENCE ROOM (GEONOSIS) - DAY

text: I don't wish to make you to join our cause against your will, Senator, but you are a rational, honest representative of your people and I assume you want to do what's in their best interest. Aren't you fed up with the corruption, the bureaucrats, the hypocrisy of it all?.. Aren't you? Be honest, Senator.
where: INT. CONFERENCE ROOM (GEONOSIS) - DAY

text: The ideals are still alive, Count, even if the institution is failing.
where: INT. CONFERENCE ROOM (GEONOSIS) - DAY

text: You believe in the same ideals we believe in! The same ideals we are striving to make prominent.
where: INT. CONFERENCE ROOM (GEONOSIS) - DAY

text: If what you say is true, you should stay in the Republic and help Chancellor Palpatine put things right.
where: INT. CONFERENCE ROOM (GEONOSIS) - DAY

text: The Chancellor means well, M'Lady but he is incompetent. He has promised to cut the bureaucracy, but the bureaucrats are stronger than ever, no? Senator, the Republic cannot be fixed. It is time to start over. The democratic process in the Republic is a sham, a shell game played on the voters. It will not be long before the cult of greed, called the Republic, will lose even the pretext of democracy and freedom.
where: INT. CONFERENCE ROOM (GEONOSIS) - DAY

text: I cannot believe that. I will not forsake all I have honoured and worked for and betray the Republic. I know of your treaties with the Trade Federation, the Commerce Guilds, and the others, Count. What is happening here is not government that has been bought out by business... it's business becoming government!
where: INT. CONFERENCE ROOM (GEONOSIS) - DAY

text: Are you willing to betray your Jedi friends? Without your co-operation I can do nothing to stop their execution.
where: INT. CONFERENCE ROOM (GEONOSIS) - DAY

text: What is to happen to me? Am I to be executed also?
where: INT. CONFERENCE ROOM (GEONOSIS) - DAY

text: I wouldn't think of such an offence. But, there are individuals who have a strong interest in your demise, M'lady. It has nothing to do with politics, I'm afraid. It's purely personal, and they have already paid great sums to have you assassinated. I'm sure they will push hard to have you included in the executions. I'm sorry but if you are not going to co-operate, I must turn you over to the Geonosians for justice. I've done all I can for you.
where: INT. CONFERENCE ROOM (GEONOSIS) - DAY

text: I'll take that weapon.
where: INT. CONFERENCE ROOM (GEONOSIS) - DAY

text: You may cause a lot of bloodshed, my young Jedi, but you will not escape.
where: INT. CONFERENCE ROOM (GEONOSIS) - DAY

text: Anakin...
where: INT. CONFERENCE ROOM (GEONOSIS) - DAY

text: You have been charged and found guilty of Espionage.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, HIGH AUDIENCE CHAMBER - DAY

text: Do you have anything to say before your sentence is carried out?
where: INT. GEONOSIS, HIGH AUDIENCE CHAMBER - DAY

text: You are committing an act of war, Archduke. I hope you are prepared for the consequences.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, HIGH AUDIENCE CHAMBER - DAY

text: We build weapons, Senator... that is our business! Of course we're prepared!
where: INT. GEONOSIS, HIGH AUDIENCE CHAMBER - DAY

text: Get on with it. Carry out the sentence. I want to see her suffer.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, HIGH AUDIENCE CHAMBER - DAY

text: Your other Jedi friend is waiting for you, Senator. Take them to the arena!
where: INT. GEONOSIS, HIGH AUDIENCE CHAMBER - DAY

text: Don't be afraid.
where: INT. GEONOSIS TUNNEL TO EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: I'm not afraid to die. I've been dying a little bit each day since you came back into my life.
where: INT. GEONOSIS TUNNEL TO EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: What are you talking about?
where: INT. GEONOSIS TUNNEL TO EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: I love you.
where: INT. GEONOSIS TUNNEL TO EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: You love me?! I thought we decided not to fall in love. That we would be forced to live a lie. That it would destroy our lives...
where: INT. GEONOSIS TUNNEL TO EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: I think our lives are about to be destroyed anyway. My love for you is a puzzle, Annie, for which I have no answers. I can't control it... and now I don't care. I truly, deeply love you, and before we die I want you to know.
where: INT. GEONOSIS TUNNEL TO EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: I have no desire to be cured of this love either. Long or short, I vow to spend the rest of my life with you.
where: INT. GEONOSIS TUNNEL TO EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: I was beginning to wonder if you had gotten my message.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: I retransmitted it as you requested, Master. Then we decided to come and rescue you.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: It looks like you're going a good job so far.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: The felons before you have been convicted of espionage against the Sovereign System of Geonosis. Their sentence of death is to be carried out in this public arena henceforth.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: Let the executions begin!
where: INT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: I have a bad feeling about this.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: Take the one the left. I'll take the one on the right.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: What about Padme?
where: INT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: It looks like she's already on top of things.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: Foul!! She can't do that... shoot her or something!
where: INT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: You okay?
where: INT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: (nods, gasping) Sure! Well, sort of.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: Jump!!!
where: INT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: This isn't how it's supposed to be! Jango, finish her off.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: (smiling enigmatically) Patiece, Viceroy... she will die. Maybe this is the way it's supposed to end.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: Yes, it has been rather a long time. Do you suppose something's happened to them?
where: INT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: (continuing) Danger? Oh no, I shouldn't think so. It looks a very dull planet to me. They should be back shortly. Just stop worrying, ARTOO.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: Master Windu, how pleasant of you to join us. You're just in time for the moment of truth. I would think these two new boys of yours could use a little more training.
where: EXT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: Sorry to disappoint you, Dooku. This party's over.
where: EXT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: (to Mace Windu) Brave, but stupid, my old Jedi friend. You're impossibly outnumbered.
where: EXT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: I don't think so. One Jedi has to be worth a hundred Geonosians.
where: EXT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: It wasn't the Geonosians I was thinking about. How well do you think one Jedi will hold up against a thousand battle droids?
where: EXT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: I don't hear anything. (ARTOO beeps) You're scaring me! Stop imagining things!
where: EXT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: Someone's got to - shut down - these droids.
where: EXT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: Don't worry! It's being - taken care of!
where: EXT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: We've done it! Now we have a chance!
where: INT. COMMAND FEDERATION STARSHIP, CONTROL BRIDGE - DAY

text: The system's off but they're still active. That's a new feature. They are independent of the control system.
where: INT. COMMAND FEDERATION STARSHIP, CONTROL BRIDGE - DAY

text: Master Windu!
where: EXT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: (continuing) You have fought gallantly. Worthy of recognition in the history archives of the Jedi Order. Now it is finished. (pauses briefly) Surrender - and your lives will be spared.
where: EXT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: We will not be hostages for you to barter with Dooku.
where: EXT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: Then, I'm sorry, old friend. You will have to be destroyed.
where: EXT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: Look!
where: EXT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: Come on - hurry! Hurry!
where: EXT. GEONOSIS, EXECUTION ARENA - DAY

text: More battalions to the left. Encircle them we must, then divide.
where: INT. GUNSHIP NUMBER ONE - DAY

text: I'm sure I heard something, this time. Didn't you? It's probably just a celebration
where: INT. GUNSHIP NUMBER ONE - DAY

text: Hold on! Look over there...
where: INT. GUNSHIP NUMBER TWO - DAY

text: It's Dooku, go after him!
where: INT. GUNSHIP NUMBER TWO - DAY

text: (continuing) Padme!!!
where: INT. GUNSHIP NUMBER TWO - DAY

text: (continuing; to pilot) Put the ship down! Down!
where: INT. GUNSHIP NUMBER TWO - DAY

text: No! Forget her. We have to go after Dooku.
where: INT. GUNSHIP NUMBER TWO - DAY

text: No we're not!! Land this ship!
where: INT. GUNSHIP NUMBER TWO - DAY

text: Don't let your personal feelings get in the way. We've got a job to do.
where: INT. GUNSHIP NUMBER TWO - DAY

text: I don't care!.. Go back.
where: INT. GUNSHIP NUMBER TWO - DAY

text: Anakin! She's all right! Look.
where: INT. GUNSHIP NUMBER TWO - DAY

text: (continuing) Follow that speeder!
where: INT. GUNSHIP NUMBER TWO - DAY

text: Your Excellency!
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: That won't be necessary, Captain. Stand down. And leave them to me.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: (to Anakin) We move in together - you slowly on the...
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: I'm taking him now!
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: Anakin, no!
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: You'll pay for all the Jedi you've killed today, Dooku.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: Kenobi, isn't it? As you can see, my Jedi powers are far beyond yours. Now, back down.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: I don't think so.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: Ah, but if I must.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: (continuing) I have spent the last ten years learning to use the power of the Dark Side. It gives me infinitely greater power.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: You will have to prove it.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: Grand Master Kenobi, you disappoint me. Yoda holds you in such high esteem.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: (continuing) Surely you can do better...? (parries) No, I'm surprised. Has Jedi swordsmanship degenerated so quickly, or are you trying to make fun of me? (cuts) Which is it?
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: (continuing) come, come, Master Kenobi. Put me out of my misery.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: (continuing) That's brave of you, boy - but foolish. I would have thought you'd have learnt your lesson.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: I'm a slow learner.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: You have unusual powers, young Padawan. But not enought to save you this time.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: Don't bet on it!
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: Anakin!
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: Master Yoda. At last we shall know who is the most powerful.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: Count Dooku. No interest in contests, do I have.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: (continuing) The end for you, Count, this is.
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: ...Not yet...
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: Anakin!
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: Resistance is at an end, General. What are your orders ?
where: INT. GEONOSIS, SECRET HANGER TOWER - LATE DAY

text: The Force is with us, my Master.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SECRET LANDING PLATFORM - DAY

text: Welcome home, Lord Tyranus. You have done well.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SECRET LANDING PLATFORM - DAY

text: I bring you good news, my Lord. The war has begun.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SECRET LANDING PLATFORM - DAY

text: Excellent. (smiling) Everything is going as planned.
where: INT. CORUSCANT, SECRET LANDING PLATFORM - DAY

text: Where is your apprentice?
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, COUNCIL CHAMBER - SUNSET

text: On his way back to Naboo. He is escorting Senator Amidala home.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, COUNCIL CHAMBER - SUNSET

text: (continuing) I must admit without the clones, it would not have been a victory.
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, COUNCIL CHAMBER - SUNSET

text: Victory? Victory, you say?
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, COUNCIL CHAMBER - SUNSET

text: (continuing) Not victory, a defeat, it was... Master Obi-Wan. Begun, the Clone War has!
where: INT. JEDI TEMPLE, COUNCIL CHAMBER - SUNSET
